TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit InstrumentedAttribute extends System.Attribute

summary.span: 指定此程序集提供管理检测。

span.span: Specifies that this assembly provides management instrumentation.

summary.span: 此属性应在每个程序集出现一次。

span.span: This attribute should appear one time per assembly.

summary.span: 注意：WMI .NET 库现在视为处于最终状态，且没有可用于会影响这些库的非安全性相关问题的进一步开发、增强或更新。

span.span: Note: the WMI .NET libraries are now considered in final state, and no further development, enhancements, or updates will be available for non-security related issues affecting these libraries.
The [MI APIs](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/wmi_v2/windows-management-infrastructure) should be used for all new development.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 初始化为根\默认命名空间设置的 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that is set for the root\default namespace.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [从部分受信任的代码使用库](/dotnet/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](/dotnet/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code).

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that is set to the specified namespace for instrumentation within this assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [从部分受信任的代码使用库](/dotnet/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](/dotnet/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code).

param.name: namespaceName
param.span: 检测实例和事件的命名空间。

param.span: 一个安全说明符，它只允许指定的用户或组来运行提供此程序集所支持检测的应用程序。

span.span: A security descriptor that allows only the specified users or groups to run applications that provide the instrumentation supported by this assembly.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that is set to the specified namespace and security settings for instrumentation within this assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [从部分受信任的代码使用库](/dotnet/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](/dotnet/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property NamespaceName As String
public: property System::String ^ NamespaceName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取或设置此程序集内检测实例和事件的命名空间。

span.span: Gets or sets the namespace for instrumentation instances and events in this assembly.

value.span: 返回 值，该值包含该程序集中的检测实例和事件的命名空间名称。

span.span: Returns a value containing the name of the namespace for instrumentation instances and events in this assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 强烈建议由程序集指定命名空间名称，并且该名称应为每个程序集或每个应用程序的唯一命名空间。It is highly recommended that the namespace name be specified by the assembly, and that it should be a unique namespace per assembly, or per application. 对于每个程序集或应用程序检测使用特定的命名空间，可以更细致地保护对不同程序集或应用程序提供的检测的访问。Having a specific namespace for each assembly or application instrumentation allows more granularity for securing access to instrumentation provided by different assemblies or applications. ## 属性值Property Value 如果未指定，则默认命名空间将设置为 " \\ \\ .\root\default"。If not specified, the default namespace will be set as "\\\\.\root\default". 否则，指示此程序集中检测实例和事件的命名空间的名称的字符串。Otherwise, a string indicating the name of the namespace for instrumentation instances and events in this assembly. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [从部分受信任的代码使用库](/dotnet/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](/dotnet/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SecurityDescriptor As String
public: property System::String ^ SecurityDescriptor { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取或设置安全说明符，该说明符只允许指定的用户或组来运行提供此程序集所支持检测的应用程序。

span.span: Gets or sets a security descriptor that allows only the specified users or groups to run applications that provide the instrumentation supported by this assembly.

value.span: 返回包含安全说明符的 值，该安全说明符只允许指定的用户或组运行提供此程序集所支持的检测的应用程序。

span.span: Returns a value containing the security descriptor that allows only the specified users or groups to run applications that provide the instrumentation supported by this assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此安全描述符中未指定的用户或组可能仍在运行该应用程序，但无法通过此程序集提供检测。Users or groups not specified in this security descriptor may still run the application, but cannot provide instrumentation from this assembly. ## 属性值Property Value 如果为 null，则默认值定义为本地管理员组。If null, the default value is defined as the Local Administrators Group. 这将只允许本地管理员组的成员发布数据并从该程序集激发事件。This will only allow members of the local administrators group to publish data and fire events from this assembly. 否则，这是一个表示安全描述符的 SDDL 格式的字符串，该安全描述符定义哪些用户和组可以提供此应用程序的检测数据和事件。Otherwise, this is a string in SDDL format representing the security descriptor that defines which users and groups can provide instrumentation data and events from this application. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [从部分受信任的代码使用库](/dotnet/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](/dotnet/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code).
